trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface and explains how to use it to manage backup jobs and the backup catalog.
trans-unit.target: Describes the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface and explains how to use it to manage backup jobs and the backup catalog.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager has an intuitive graphical user interface (GUI) that you can use to manage backup copies of volume groups, including those stored locally and in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager has an intuitive graphical user interface (GUI) that you can use to manage backup copies of volume groups, including those stored locally and in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial provides an introduction to the interface, and then explains how to use each of the components.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial provides an introduction to the interface, and then explains how to use each of the components.

trans-unit.source: (For a detailed description of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager, see <linkText>What is StorSimple Snapshot Manager?</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: (For a detailed description of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager, see <linkText>What is StorSimple Snapshot Manager?</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: To view the user interface, click the StorSimple Snapshot Manager icon on your desktop.
trans-unit.target: To view the user interface, click the StorSimple Snapshot Manager icon on your desktop.

trans-unit.source: The console window appears, as shown in the following illustration.
trans-unit.target: The console window appears, as shown in the following illustration.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager panes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager panes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 1: StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI
trans-unit.target: Figure 1: StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI

trans-unit.source: The console window has five major elements.
trans-unit.target: The console window has five major elements.

trans-unit.source: Click the appropriate link for a complete description of each element.
trans-unit.target: Click the appropriate link for a complete description of each element.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Menu bar</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Menu bar</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Tool bar</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Tool bar</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scope pane</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scope pane</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Results pane</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Results pane</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Actions pane</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Actions pane</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the StorSimple Snapshot Manager supports <linkText>keyboard navigation and a number of shortcuts</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the StorSimple Snapshot Manager supports <linkText>keyboard navigation and a number of shortcuts</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface supports the accessibility features provided by the Windows operating system and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), as well as some StorSimple Snapshot Manager–specific keyboard shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface supports the accessibility features provided by the Windows operating system and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), as well as some StorSimple Snapshot Manager–specific keyboard shortcuts.

trans-unit.source: For a description of the Windows accessibility features, go to <linkText>Keyboard shortcuts for Windows</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For a description of the Windows accessibility features, go to <linkText>Keyboard shortcuts for Windows</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of the MMC accessibility features, go to <linkText>Accessibility for MMC 3.0</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For a description of the MMC accessibility features, go to <linkText>Accessibility for MMC 3.0</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: For a description of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager accessibility features, go to <linkText>Keyboard navigation and shortcuts</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For a description of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager accessibility features, go to <linkText>Keyboard navigation and shortcuts</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The menu bar at the top of the console window contains <linkText>File</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Action</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>View</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Favorites</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Window</linkText><title></title>, and <linkText>Help</linkText><title></title> menus.
trans-unit.target: The menu bar at the top of the console window contains <linkText>File</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Action</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>View</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Favorites</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Window</linkText><title></title>, and <linkText>Help</linkText><title></title> menus.

trans-unit.source: Click any item on the menu bar to see a list of available commands on that menu.
trans-unit.target: Click any item on the menu bar to see a list of available commands on that menu.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the View menu selected on the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows the View menu selected on the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>View menu selected</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>View menu selected</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 2: StorSimple Snapshot Manager menu bar with View selected
trans-unit.target: Figure 2: StorSimple Snapshot Manager menu bar with View selected

trans-unit.source: The File menu contains standard Microsoft Management Console (MMC) commands.
trans-unit.target: The File menu contains standard Microsoft Management Console (MMC) commands.

trans-unit.source: To view the File menu, click File on the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: To view the File menu, click File on the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: The following menu appears.
trans-unit.target: The following menu appears.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager File menu</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager File menu</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 3: StorSimple Snapshot Manager File menu
trans-unit.target: Figure 3: StorSimple Snapshot Manager File menu

trans-unit.source: The following table describes items that appear on the File menu.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes items that appear on the File menu.

trans-unit.source: Menu item
trans-unit.target: Menu item

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: New
trans-unit.target: New

trans-unit.source: Click New to create a new console based on the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click New to create a new console based on the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Open
trans-unit.target: Open

trans-unit.source: Click Open to open an existing console.
trans-unit.target: Click Open to open an existing console.

trans-unit.source: Save
trans-unit.target: Save

trans-unit.source: Click Save to save the current console.
trans-unit.target: Click Save to save the current console.

trans-unit.source: Save as
trans-unit.target: Save as

trans-unit.source: Click Save As to create a new, renamed instance of the current console.
trans-unit.target: Click Save As to create a new, renamed instance of the current console.

trans-unit.source: Use the Save As option to customize a view and save it for later retrieval.
trans-unit.target: Use the Save As option to customize a view and save it for later retrieval.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create StorSimple Snapshot Manager snap-ins that point to specific servers.
trans-unit.target: For example, you could create StorSimple Snapshot Manager snap-ins that point to specific servers.

trans-unit.source: Add/Remove Snap-in
trans-unit.target: Add/Remove Snap-in

trans-unit.source: Click Add/Remove Snap-in to add or remove snap-ins and to organize nodes in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: Click Add/Remove Snap-in to add or remove snap-ins and to organize nodes in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: For more information, go to <linkText>Add, Remove, and Organize Snap-ins and Extensions in MMC 3.0</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, go to <linkText>Add, Remove, and Organize Snap-ins and Extensions in MMC 3.0</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: Options

trans-unit.source: Click Options to change the console icon, specify user access modes and permissions, or delete console files to increase available disk space.
trans-unit.target: Click Options to change the console icon, specify user access modes and permissions, or delete console files to increase available disk space.

trans-unit.source: List of file paths
trans-unit.target: List of file paths

trans-unit.source: Click a path in the numbered list to reopen a file that you recently opened.
trans-unit.target: Click a path in the numbered list to reopen a file that you recently opened.

trans-unit.source: Exit
trans-unit.target: Exit

trans-unit.source: Click Exit to close the File menu.
trans-unit.target: Click Exit to close the File menu.

trans-unit.source: Use the Action menu to select from available actions.
trans-unit.target: Use the Action menu to select from available actions.

trans-unit.source: The items available to you depend on the selection you make in the Scope pane or Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The items available to you depend on the selection you make in the Scope pane or Results pane.

trans-unit.source: To view the Action menu, do one of the following:
trans-unit.target: To view the Action menu, do one of the following:

trans-unit.source: Right-click an item in the Scope pane or Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Right-click an item in the Scope pane or Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Select an item in the Scope pane or Results pane, and then click Action on the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: Select an item in the Scope pane or Results pane, and then click Action on the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you select the top node in the Scope pane, and then right-click or click Action in the menu bar, the following menu appears.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you select the top node in the Scope pane, and then right-click or click Action in the menu bar, the following menu appears.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Action menu</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Action menu</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 4: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Action menu
trans-unit.target: Figure 4: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Action menu

trans-unit.source: The Actions pane (on the right of the console) contains the same list of actions as the Action menu.
trans-unit.target: The Actions pane (on the right of the console) contains the same list of actions as the Action menu.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the Actions pane contains the View menu options, which enable you to create a custom view of the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the Actions pane contains the View menu options, which enable you to create a custom view of the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Actions pane with View menu open</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Actions pane with View menu open</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 5: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Actions pane with View menu
trans-unit.target: Figure 5: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Actions pane with View menu

trans-unit.source: The following table contains an alphabetical list of StorSimple Snapshot Manager actions.
trans-unit.target: The following table contains an alphabetical list of StorSimple Snapshot Manager actions.

trans-unit.source: The Action column lists actions that you can perform on nodes and results.
trans-unit.target: The Action column lists actions that you can perform on nodes and results.

trans-unit.source: The Navigation column explains how to display the appropriate Action menu so that you can select the action.
trans-unit.target: The Navigation column explains how to display the appropriate Action menu so that you can select the action.

trans-unit.source: Some actions appear in multiple Action menus.
trans-unit.target: Some actions appear in multiple Action menus.

trans-unit.source: For these actions, select one Navigation option from the bulleted list.
trans-unit.target: For these actions, select one Navigation option from the bulleted list.

trans-unit.source: The Description column describes how to use each action on the Action menu or Actions pane, and explains what it does.
trans-unit.target: The Description column describes how to use each action on the Action menu or Actions pane, and explains what it does.

trans-unit.source: The Actions pane and Action menus contain additional options, such as View, New Window from here, Refresh, Export List, and Help.
trans-unit.target: The Actions pane and Action menus contain additional options, such as View, New Window from here, Refresh, Export List, and Help.

trans-unit.source: These options are available as a part of the MMC, and are not specific to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: These options are available as a part of the MMC, and are not specific to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: The table includes descriptions of these options.
trans-unit.target: The table includes descriptions of these options.

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Action

trans-unit.source: Navigation
trans-unit.target: Navigation

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Authenticate
trans-unit.target: Authenticate

trans-unit.source: Click the Devices node, and right-click a device in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Click the Devices node, and right-click a device in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Click Authenticate to enter the password that you configured for the device.
trans-unit.target: Click Authenticate to enter the password that you configured for the device.

trans-unit.source: Clone
trans-unit.target: Clone

trans-unit.source: Expand Backup Catalog, expand Cloud Snapshots, click a dated backup, and then select a volume in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Expand Backup Catalog, expand Cloud Snapshots, click a dated backup, and then select a volume in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Click Clone to create a copy of a cloud snapshot and store it in a location that you designate.
trans-unit.target: Click Clone to create a copy of a cloud snapshot and store it in a location that you designate.

trans-unit.source: Configure a Device
trans-unit.target: Configure a Device

trans-unit.source: Right-click the Devices node.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the Devices node.

trans-unit.source: Click Configure a Device to configure a single device or multiple devices to connect to the Windows host.
trans-unit.target: Click Configure a Device to configure a single device or multiple devices to connect to the Windows host.

trans-unit.source: Create Backup Policy
trans-unit.target: Create Backup Policy

trans-unit.source:
Do one of the following:
  • Right-click Backup Policies.
  • Click or expand Volume Groups, and then right-click a volume group.
  • Click or expand Backup Catalog, and then right-click a volume group.
trans-unit.target:
Do one of the following:
  • Right-click Backup Policies.
  • Click or expand Volume Groups, and then right-click a volume group.
  • Click or expand Backup Catalog, and then right-click a volume group.

trans-unit.source: Click Create Backup Policy to configure a scheduled backup for a volume group.
trans-unit.target: Click Create Backup Policy to configure a scheduled backup for a volume group.

trans-unit.source: Create Volume Group
trans-unit.target: Create Volume Group

trans-unit.source:
Do one of the following:
  • Click the Volumes node, and then right-click a volume in the Results pane.
  • Right-click the Volume Groups node.
trans-unit.target:
Do one of the following:
  • Click the Volumes node, and then right-click a volume in the Results pane.
  • Right-click the Volume Groups node.

trans-unit.source: Click Create Volume Group to assign volumes to a volume group.
trans-unit.target: Click Create Volume Group to assign volumes to a volume group.

trans-unit.source: Delete
trans-unit.target: Delete

trans-unit.source: Click a node or result (This item appears on many Action menus and Actions panes.)
trans-unit.target: Click a node or result (This item appears on many Action menus and Actions panes.)

trans-unit.source: Click Delete to delete the node or result that you selected.
trans-unit.target: Click Delete to delete the node or result that you selected.

trans-unit.source: When the confirmation dialog box appears, confirm or cancel the deletion.
trans-unit.target: When the confirmation dialog box appears, confirm or cancel the deletion.

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Details

trans-unit.source: Click the Devices node, and then right-click a device in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Click the Devices node, and then right-click a device in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Click Details to see the configuration details for a device.
trans-unit.target: Click Details to see the configuration details for a device.

trans-unit.source: Edit
trans-unit.target: Edit

trans-unit.source: Click Backup Policies, and then right-click a policy in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Click Backup Policies, and then right-click a policy in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Click Edit to change the backup schedule for a volume group.
trans-unit.target: Click Edit to change the backup schedule for a volume group.

trans-unit.source: Export List
trans-unit.target: Export List

trans-unit.source: Click any node or result (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)
trans-unit.target: Click any node or result (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)

trans-unit.source: Click Export List to save a list in a comma-separated value (CSV) file.
trans-unit.target: Click Export List to save a list in a comma-separated value (CSV) file.

trans-unit.source: You can then import this file into a spreadsheet application for analysis.
trans-unit.target: You can then import this file into a spreadsheet application for analysis.

trans-unit.source: Help
trans-unit.target: Help

trans-unit.source: Click any node or result.
trans-unit.target: Click any node or result.

trans-unit.source: (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)
trans-unit.target: (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)

trans-unit.source: Click Help to open online Help in a separate browser window.
trans-unit.target: Click Help to open online Help in a separate browser window.

trans-unit.source: New Window from Here
trans-unit.target: New Window from Here

trans-unit.source: Click any node or result (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)
trans-unit.target: Click any node or result (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)

trans-unit.source: Click New Window from Here to open a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager window.
trans-unit.target: Click New Window from Here to open a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager window.

trans-unit.source: Refresh
trans-unit.target: Refresh

trans-unit.source: Click any node or result (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)
trans-unit.target: Click any node or result (This item appears on all Action menus and Actions panes.)

trans-unit.source: Click Refresh to update the currently displayed StorSimple Snapshot Manager window.
trans-unit.target: Click Refresh to update the currently displayed StorSimple Snapshot Manager window.

trans-unit.source: Refresh Device
trans-unit.target: Refresh Device

trans-unit.source: Click the Devices node, and right-click a device in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Click the Devices node, and right-click a device in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Click Refresh Device to synchronize a specific connected device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click Refresh Device to synchronize a specific connected device with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Refresh Devices
trans-unit.target: Refresh Devices

trans-unit.source: Right-click the Devices node.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the Devices node.

trans-unit.source: Click Refresh Devices to synchronize your list of connected devices with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click Refresh Devices to synchronize your list of connected devices with StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Rescan volumes
trans-unit.target: Rescan volumes

trans-unit.source: Right-click the Volumes node.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the Volumes node.

trans-unit.source: Click Rescan volumes to update the list of volumes that appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Click Rescan volumes to update the list of volumes that appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Restore
trans-unit.target: Restore

trans-unit.source: Expand Backup Catalog, expand a volume group, expand Local Snapshots or Cloud Snapshots, and then right-click a backup.
trans-unit.target: Expand Backup Catalog, expand a volume group, expand Local Snapshots or Cloud Snapshots, and then right-click a backup.

trans-unit.source: Click Restore to replace the current volume group data with the data from the selected backup.
trans-unit.target: Click Restore to replace the current volume group data with the data from the selected backup.

trans-unit.source: Take Backup
trans-unit.target: Take Backup

trans-unit.source:
Do one of the following:
  • Expand Volume Groups, and then right-click a volume group.
  • Expand Backup Catalog, and then right-click a volume group.
trans-unit.target:
Do one of the following:
  • Expand Volume Groups, and then right-click a volume group.
  • Expand Backup Catalog, and then right-click a volume group.

trans-unit.source: Click Take Backup to start a backup job immediately.
trans-unit.target: Click Take Backup to start a backup job immediately.

trans-unit.source: Toggle Imports Display
trans-unit.target: Toggle Imports Display

trans-unit.source: Right-click the top node in the Scope pane (the StorSimple Snapshot Manager node in the examples).
trans-unit.target: Right-click the top node in the Scope pane (the StorSimple Snapshot Manager node in the examples).

trans-unit.source: Click Toggle Imports Display to show or hide the volume groups and associated backups that were imported from the StorSimple Manager service dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Click Toggle Imports Display to show or hide the volume groups and associated backups that were imported from the StorSimple Manager service dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Use the View menu to create a custom view of the Results pane contents.
trans-unit.target: Use the View menu to create a custom view of the Results pane contents.

trans-unit.source: The View menu contains Add/Remove Columns and Customize options.
trans-unit.target: The View menu contains Add/Remove Columns and Customize options.

trans-unit.source: You can access the View menu on the menu bar or in the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: You can access the View menu on the menu bar or in the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager View menu</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager View menu</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 6: StorSimple Snapshot Manager View menu
trans-unit.target: Figure 6: StorSimple Snapshot Manager View menu

trans-unit.source: The following table describes items that appear on the View menu.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes items that appear on the View menu.

trans-unit.source: Menu item
trans-unit.target: Menu item

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Add/Remove Columns
trans-unit.target: Add/Remove Columns

trans-unit.source: Click Add/Remove Columns to add or remove columns in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Click Add/Remove Columns to add or remove columns in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Customize
trans-unit.target: Customize

trans-unit.source: Click Customize to show or hide items in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager console window.
trans-unit.target: Click Customize to show or hide items in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager console window.

trans-unit.source: Use the Favorites menu to add, remove, and organize page views and tasks that you use frequently.
trans-unit.target: Use the Favorites menu to add, remove, and organize page views and tasks that you use frequently.

trans-unit.source: You can access the Favorites menu on the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: You can access the Favorites menu on the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Favorites menu</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Favorites menu</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 7: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Favorites menu
trans-unit.target: Figure 7: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Favorites menu

trans-unit.source: The following table describes items that appear on the Favorites menu.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes items that appear on the Favorites menu.

trans-unit.source: Menu item
trans-unit.target: Menu item

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Add to Favorites
trans-unit.target: Add to Favorites

trans-unit.source: Click Add to Favorites to add the current view to your list of favorites.
trans-unit.target: Click Add to Favorites to add the current view to your list of favorites.

trans-unit.source: Organize Favorites
trans-unit.target: Organize Favorites

trans-unit.source: Click Organize Favorites to organize the contents of your Favorites folder.
trans-unit.target: Click Organize Favorites to organize the contents of your Favorites folder.

trans-unit.source: Use the Window menu to add and rearrange StorSimple Snapshot Manager console windows.
trans-unit.target: Use the Window menu to add and rearrange StorSimple Snapshot Manager console windows.

trans-unit.source: You can access the Window menu on the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: You can access the Window menu on the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Window menu</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Window menu</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 8: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Window menu
trans-unit.target: Figure 8: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Window menu

trans-unit.source: The numbered list at the bottom of the menu shows the windows that are currently open.
trans-unit.target: The numbered list at the bottom of the menu shows the windows that are currently open.

trans-unit.source: Click any window in that list to bring the window into the foreground.
trans-unit.target: Click any window in that list to bring the window into the foreground.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the items that appear on the Window menu.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the items that appear on the Window menu.

trans-unit.source: Menu item
trans-unit.target: Menu item

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: New Window
trans-unit.target: New Window

trans-unit.source: Click New Window to open a new console window (in addition to the existing window).
trans-unit.target: Click New Window to open a new console window (in addition to the existing window).

trans-unit.source: Cascade
trans-unit.target: Cascade

trans-unit.source: Click Cascade to display the open console windows in a cascading style.
trans-unit.target: Click Cascade to display the open console windows in a cascading style.

trans-unit.source: Tile Horizontally
trans-unit.target: Tile Horizontally

trans-unit.source: Click Tile Horizontally to display the open console windows in a tile (or grid) format.
trans-unit.target: Click Tile Horizontally to display the open console windows in a tile (or grid) format.

trans-unit.source: Arrange Icons
trans-unit.target: Arrange Icons

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple console windows open and scattered over your desktop, minimize them and then click Arrange Icons to arrange them in a horizontal row on the bottom of your screen.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple console windows open and scattered over your desktop, minimize them and then click Arrange Icons to arrange them in a horizontal row on the bottom of your screen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Help menu to view available online help for StorSimple Snapshot Manager and the MMC.
trans-unit.target: Use the Help menu to view available online help for StorSimple Snapshot Manager and the MMC.

trans-unit.source: You can also view information about the MMC and StorSimple Snapshot Manager software versions that are currently installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: You can also view information about the MMC and StorSimple Snapshot Manager software versions that are currently installed on your system.

trans-unit.source: You can access the Help menu on the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: You can access the Help menu on the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: You can also access StorSimple Snapshot Manager help topics from the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: You can also access StorSimple Snapshot Manager help topics from the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Help menu</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>StorSimple Snapshot Manager Help menu</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 9: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Help menu
trans-unit.target: Figure 9: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Help menu

trans-unit.source: The following table describes items that appear on the Help menu.

trans-unit.target: Menu item

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Help on StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: Help on StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Click Help on StorSimple Snapshot Manager to open StorSimple Snapshot Manager help in a separate window.
trans-unit.target: Click Help on StorSimple Snapshot Manager to open StorSimple Snapshot Manager help in a separate window.

trans-unit.source: Help Topics
trans-unit.target: Help Topics

trans-unit.source: Click Help Topics to open MMC online help in a separate window.
trans-unit.target: Click Help Topics to open MMC online help in a separate window.

trans-unit.source: TechCenter Web Site
trans-unit.target: TechCenter Web Site

trans-unit.source: Click TechCenter Web Site to open the Microsoft TechNet Tech Center home page in a separate window.
trans-unit.target: Click TechCenter Web Site to open the Microsoft TechNet Tech Center home page in a separate window.

trans-unit.source: About Microsoft Management Console
trans-unit.target: About Microsoft Management Console

trans-unit.source: Click About Microsoft Management Console to see which version of the Microsoft Management Console is installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: Click About Microsoft Management Console to see which version of the Microsoft Management Console is installed on your system.

trans-unit.source: About StorSimple Snapshot Manager
trans-unit.target: About StorSimple Snapshot Manager

trans-unit.source: Click About StorSimple Snapshot Manager to see which version of the snap-in is installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: Click About StorSimple Snapshot Manager to see which version of the snap-in is installed on your system.

trans-unit.source: The tool bar, located below the menu bar, contains navigation and task icons.
trans-unit.target: The tool bar, located below the menu bar, contains navigation and task icons.

trans-unit.source: Each icon is a shortcut to a specific task.
trans-unit.target: Each icon is a shortcut to a specific task.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the icons that appear on the tool bar.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the icons that appear on the tool bar.

trans-unit.source: Icon
trans-unit.target: Icon

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Left arrow</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Left arrow</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the left arrow icon to return to the previous page.
trans-unit.target: Click the left arrow icon to return to the previous page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Right arrow</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Right arrow</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the right arrow to go the next page (if the arrow is gray, the action is unavailable).
trans-unit.target: Click the right arrow to go the next page (if the arrow is gray, the action is unavailable).

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Up icon</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Up icon</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the up icon to go up one level in the console tree (the Scope pane).
trans-unit.target: Click the up icon to go up one level in the console tree (the Scope pane).

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Show/hide console tree</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Show/hide console tree</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the show/hide console tree icon to show or hide the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: Click the show/hide console tree icon to show or hide the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Export list</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Export list</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the export list icon to export a list to a CSV file that you specify.
trans-unit.target: Click the export list icon to export a list to a CSV file that you specify.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Help icon</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Help icon</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the help icon to open an online MMC help topic.
trans-unit.target: Click the help icon to open an online MMC help topic.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Show/hide Actions pane</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Show/hide Actions pane</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the show/hide Actions pane icon to show or hide the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: Click the show/hide Actions pane icon to show or hide the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: The Scope pane is the left pane in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI.
trans-unit.target: The Scope pane is the left pane in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI.

trans-unit.source: It contains the console (or node) tree and is the primary navigation mechanism for StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: It contains the console (or node) tree and is the primary navigation mechanism for StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: The Scope pane contains a series of clickable objects (nodes) organized in a tree structure.
trans-unit.target: The Scope pane contains a series of clickable objects (nodes) organized in a tree structure.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scope pane</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scope pane</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 10: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Scope pane
trans-unit.target: Figure 10: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Scope pane

trans-unit.source: To expand or collapse a node, click the arrow icon next to the node name.
trans-unit.target: To expand or collapse a node, click the arrow icon next to the node name.

trans-unit.source: To view the status or contents of a node, click the node name.
trans-unit.target: To view the status or contents of a node, click the node name.

trans-unit.source: The information appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The information appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Scope pane contains the following nodes:
trans-unit.target: The Scope pane contains the following nodes:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Devices node</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Devices node</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Volumes node</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Volumes node</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Volume Groups node</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Volume Groups node</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Backup Policies node</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Backup Policies node</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Backup Catalog node</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Backup Catalog node</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Jobs node</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Jobs node</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Scope pane to complete an action on a specific node.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Scope pane to complete an action on a specific node.

trans-unit.source: To select a task, do one of the following:
trans-unit.target: To select a task, do one of the following:

trans-unit.source: Right-click the node, and then select the task from the menu that appears.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the node, and then select the task from the menu that appears.

trans-unit.source: Click the node, and then click Action on the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: Click the node, and then click Action on the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: Select the task from the menu that appears.
trans-unit.target: Select the task from the menu that appears.

trans-unit.source: Click the node, and then select the action in the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: Click the node, and then select the action in the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: When you select a node and use any of these methods to see a task list, only those actions that can be performed on that node are shown.
trans-unit.target: When you select a node and use any of these methods to see a task list, only those actions that can be performed on that node are shown.

trans-unit.source: The Devices node represents the StorSimple devices and StorSimple virtual devices that are connected to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: The Devices node represents the StorSimple devices and StorSimple virtual devices that are connected to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: Select this node to connect and configure a device, and import its associated volumes, volumes groups, and existing backup copies.
trans-unit.target: Select this node to connect and configure a device, and import its associated volumes, volumes groups, and existing backup copies.

trans-unit.source: Multiple devices can be connected to a single host.
trans-unit.target: Multiple devices can be connected to a single host.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Devices.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Devices.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Devices node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Devices node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of configured devices, click Devices in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of configured devices, click Devices in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The list of devices, together with information about each device, appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of devices, together with information about each device, appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Volumes node represents the drives that correspond to the volumes mounted by the host, including those discovered through iSCSI and those discovered through a device.
trans-unit.target: The Volumes node represents the drives that correspond to the volumes mounted by the host, including those discovered through iSCSI and those discovered through a device.

trans-unit.source: Use this node to view the list of available volumes and assign individual volumes to volume groups.
trans-unit.target: Use this node to view the list of available volumes and assign individual volumes to volume groups.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Volumes.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Volumes.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Volumes node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Volumes node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of volumes, click Volumes in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of volumes, click Volumes in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The list of volumes, together with information about each volume, appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of volumes, together with information about each volume, appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Volume groups are also known as consistency groups.
trans-unit.target: Volume groups are also known as consistency groups.

trans-unit.source: Each volume group is a pool of application-related volumes that helps to ensure application consistency during backup operations.
trans-unit.target: Each volume group is a pool of application-related volumes that helps to ensure application consistency during backup operations.

trans-unit.source: Use the Volume Groups node to configure these groups and to take interactive backups or create backup schedules.
trans-unit.target: Use the Volume Groups node to configure these groups and to take interactive backups or create backup schedules.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Volume Groups.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Volume Groups.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Volume Groups node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Volume Groups node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of volume groups, click Volume Groups in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of volume groups, click Volume Groups in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The list of volume groups, together with information about each volume group, appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of volume groups, together with information about each volume group, appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Backup policies are job schedules for local and cloud snapshots.
trans-unit.target: Backup policies are job schedules for local and cloud snapshots.

trans-unit.source: Use the Backup Policies node to specify how often a backup is created and how long a backup should be retained.
trans-unit.target: Use the Backup Policies node to specify how often a backup is created and how long a backup should be retained.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Backup Policies.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Backup Policies.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Backup Policies node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Backup Policies node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of backup policies, click Backup Policies in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of backup policies, click Backup Policies in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The list of backup policies, together with information about each policy, appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of backup policies, together with information about each policy, appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: You can retain a maximum of 64 backups.
trans-unit.target: You can retain a maximum of 64 backups.

trans-unit.source: The Backup Catalog node contains lists of on-site and off-site backups of Azure StorSimple volumes.
trans-unit.target: The Backup Catalog node contains lists of on-site and off-site backups of Azure StorSimple volumes.

trans-unit.source: This node is organized by volume group, and each volume group container contains separate structures for local snapshots (the Local Snapshots node) and cloud snapshots (the Cloud Snapshots node).
trans-unit.target: This node is organized by volume group, and each volume group container contains separate structures for local snapshots (the Local Snapshots node) and cloud snapshots (the Cloud Snapshots node).

trans-unit.source: When expanded, each volume group container lists all the successful backups that were taken interactively or by a configured policy.
trans-unit.target: When expanded, each volume group container lists all the successful backups that were taken interactively or by a configured policy.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Backup Catalog.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Backup Catalog.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Backup Catalog node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Backup Catalog node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of backup snapshots, click Backup Catalog in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of backup snapshots, click Backup Catalog in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The list of snapshots, together with information about each snapshot, appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of snapshots, together with information about each snapshot, appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Local Snapshots node lists local snapshots for a specific volume group.
trans-unit.target: The Local Snapshots node lists local snapshots for a specific volume group.

trans-unit.source: The node is located under the Backup Catalog node in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: The node is located under the Backup Catalog node in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: Local snapshots are point-in-time copies of volume data that are stored on the Azure StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Local snapshots are point-in-time copies of volume data that are stored on the Azure StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this type of backup can be created and restored quickly.
trans-unit.target: Typically, this type of backup can be created and restored quickly.

trans-unit.source: You can use a local snapshot as you would a local backup copy.
trans-unit.target: You can use a local snapshot as you would a local backup copy.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Local Snapshots.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Local Snapshots.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Local Snapshots node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Local Snapshots node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of local snapshots, click Local Snapshots in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of local snapshots, click Local Snapshots in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The list of snapshots, together with information about each snapshot, appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of snapshots, together with information about each snapshot, appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Snapshots node lists cloud snapshots for a specific volume group.
trans-unit.target: The Cloud Snapshots node lists cloud snapshots for a specific volume group.

trans-unit.source: The node is located under the Backup Catalog node in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: The node is located under the Backup Catalog node in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: Cloud snapshots are point-in-time copies of volume data that are stored in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Cloud snapshots are point-in-time copies of volume data that are stored in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: A cloud snapshot is equivalent to a snapshot replicated on a different, off-site storage system.
trans-unit.target: A cloud snapshot is equivalent to a snapshot replicated on a different, off-site storage system.

trans-unit.source: Cloud snapshots are particularly useful in disaster recovery scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Cloud snapshots are particularly useful in disaster recovery scenarios.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Cloud Snapshots.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Cloud Snapshots.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Cloud Snapshots node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Cloud Snapshots node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of cloud snapshots, click Cloud Snapshots in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of cloud snapshots, click Cloud Snapshots in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The list of snapshots, together with information about each snapshot, appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of snapshots, together with information about each snapshot, appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Jobs node contains information about scheduled, running, and recently completed backup jobs.
trans-unit.target: The Jobs node contains information about scheduled, running, and recently completed backup jobs.

trans-unit.source: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Jobs.
trans-unit.target: To expand the node, click the arrow icon next to Jobs.

trans-unit.source: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Jobs node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.
trans-unit.target: To see a menu of available actions, right-click the Jobs node or right-click any of the nodes that appear in the expanded view.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of scheduled jobs, expand the Jobs node, and then click Scheduled.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of scheduled jobs, expand the Jobs node, and then click Scheduled.

trans-unit.source: The list of previously configured jobs and information about each job appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of previously configured jobs and information about each job appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of recently completed jobs, expand the Jobs node, and then click Last 24 Hours.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of recently completed jobs, expand the Jobs node, and then click Last 24 Hours.

trans-unit.source: A list of jobs that were completed in the last 24 hours appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: A list of jobs that were completed in the last 24 hours appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Results pane also contains information about each completed job.
trans-unit.target: The Results pane also contains information about each completed job.

trans-unit.source: To see a list of jobs that are currently running, expand the Jobs node, and then click Running.
trans-unit.target: To see a list of jobs that are currently running, expand the Jobs node, and then click Running.

trans-unit.source: The list of currently running jobs and information about each job appears in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The list of currently running jobs and information about each job appears in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Results pane is the center pane in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI.
trans-unit.target: The Results pane is the center pane in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI.

trans-unit.source: It contains lists and detailed status information for the node you selected in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: It contains lists and detailed status information for the node you selected in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: To see the following example, click the Volume Groups node in the Scope pane.
trans-unit.target: To see the following example, click the Volume Groups node in the Scope pane.

trans-unit.source: The Results pane displays a list of volume groups with details about each group.
trans-unit.target: The Results pane displays a list of volume groups with details about each group.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Results pane</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Results pane</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 11: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Results pane
trans-unit.target: Figure 11: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Results pane

trans-unit.source: You can configure the details shown in the Results pane: right-click a node in the Scope pane, click View, and then click Add/Remove Columns.
trans-unit.target: You can configure the details shown in the Results pane: right-click a node in the Scope pane, click View, and then click Add/Remove Columns.

trans-unit.source: The Actions pane is the right pane in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI.
trans-unit.target: The Actions pane is the right pane in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager UI.

trans-unit.source: It contains a menu of operations that you can perform on the node, view, or data that you select in the Scope pane or Results pane.
trans-unit.target: It contains a menu of operations that you can perform on the node, view, or data that you select in the Scope pane or Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Actions pane contains the same commands as the Action menus that are available for items in the Scope pane and Results pane.
trans-unit.target: The Actions pane contains the same commands as the Action menus that are available for items in the Scope pane and Results pane.

trans-unit.source: For a description of each action, see the table in the Action menu section.
trans-unit.target: For a description of each action, see the table in the Action menu section.

trans-unit.source: To see the following example, in the Scope pane, expand the Jobs node and click Scheduled.
trans-unit.target: To see the following example, in the Scope pane, expand the Jobs node and click Scheduled.

trans-unit.source: The Actions pane displays the available actions for the Scheduled node.
trans-unit.target: The Actions pane displays the available actions for the Scheduled node.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Actions pane scheduled jobs example</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Actions pane scheduled jobs example</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 12: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Actions pane (scheduled jobs)
trans-unit.target: Figure 12: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Actions pane (scheduled jobs)

trans-unit.source: To see more options, in the Scope pane, expand the Jobs node, click Scheduled, and then click a scheduled job in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: To see more options, in the Scope pane, expand the Jobs node, click Scheduled, and then click a scheduled job in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: The Actions pane displays the available actions for the scheduled job, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: The Actions pane displays the available actions for the scheduled job, as shown in the following example.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Actions pane job actions example</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Actions pane job actions example</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 13: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Actions pane (for a specific job)
trans-unit.target: Figure 13: StorSimple Snapshot Manager Actions pane (for a specific job)

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager enables the accessibility features of the Windows operating system and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager enables the accessibility features of the Windows operating system and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).

trans-unit.source: It also includes some keyboard navigation features and shortcuts that are specific to the StorSimple Snapshot Manager, as described in the following sections.
trans-unit.target: It also includes some keyboard navigation features and shortcuts that are specific to the StorSimple Snapshot Manager, as described in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Keyboard navigation keys</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Keyboard navigation keys</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Menu bar shortcut keys</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Menu bar shortcut keys</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scope pane shortcut keys</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scope pane shortcut keys</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the keys that you can use to navigate the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the keys that you can use to navigate the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface.

trans-unit.source: Navigation key
trans-unit.target: Navigation key

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Action

trans-unit.source: Down arrow key
trans-unit.target: Down arrow key

trans-unit.source: Use the down arrow key to move vertically to the next item in a menu or pane.
trans-unit.target: Use the down arrow key to move vertically to the next item in a menu or pane.

trans-unit.source: Enter
trans-unit.target: Enter

trans-unit.source: Press the Enter key to complete an action and then proceed to the next step.
trans-unit.target: Press the Enter key to complete an action and then proceed to the next step.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can press Enter to select Next, OK, or Create, and then go to the next step in a wizard.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can press Enter to select Next, OK, or Create, and then go to the next step in a wizard.

trans-unit.source: Esc
trans-unit.target: Esc

trans-unit.source: Press the Esc key to close a menu or to cancel and close a page.
trans-unit.target: Press the Esc key to close a menu or to cancel and close a page.

trans-unit.source: F1
trans-unit.target: F1

trans-unit.source: Press the F1 key to view a help topic for the currently active window.
trans-unit.target: Press the F1 key to view a help topic for the currently active window.

trans-unit.source: F5
trans-unit.target: F5

trans-unit.source: Press the F5 key to refresh a node.
trans-unit.target: Press the F5 key to refresh a node.

trans-unit.source: F6
trans-unit.target: F6

trans-unit.source: Press the F6 key to move from the Scope pane to the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: Press the F6 key to move from the Scope pane to the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: Press the F10 key to go to the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: Press the F10 key to go to the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: Left arrow key
trans-unit.target: Left arrow key

trans-unit.source: Use the left arrow key to move horizontally from a menu bar option to the previous option.
trans-unit.target: Use the left arrow key to move horizontally from a menu bar option to the previous option.

trans-unit.source: When you move to the previous item on the menu bar, the action (or context) menu for the previous item appears.
trans-unit.target: When you move to the previous item on the menu bar, the action (or context) menu for the previous item appears.

trans-unit.source: Right arrow key
trans-unit.target: Right arrow key

trans-unit.source: Use the right arrow key to move horizontally from one menu bar option to the next.
trans-unit.target: Use the right arrow key to move horizontally from one menu bar option to the next.

trans-unit.source: When you move to the next item on the menu bar, the action (or context) menu for the new item appears.
trans-unit.target: When you move to the next item on the menu bar, the action (or context) menu for the new item appears.

trans-unit.source: Tab key
trans-unit.target: Tab key

trans-unit.source: Use the Tab key to move to the next pane on the console or to the next selection or text box in a page.
trans-unit.target: Use the Tab key to move to the next pane on the console or to the next selection or text box in a page.

trans-unit.source: Up arrow key
trans-unit.target: Up arrow key

trans-unit.source: Use the up arrow key to move vertically to the previous item on a menu or pane.
trans-unit.target: Use the up arrow key to move vertically to the previous item on a menu or pane.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the shortcut key combinations for the menu bar.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the shortcut key combinations for the menu bar.

trans-unit.source: After you press the shortcut keys and the menu opens, you can use menu shortcut keys (the underlined keys on the menu).
trans-unit.target: After you press the shortcut keys and the menu opens, you can use menu shortcut keys (the underlined keys on the menu).

trans-unit.source: For more information about the menu bar, go to <linkText>Menu bar</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the menu bar, go to <linkText>Menu bar</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Shortcut
trans-unit.target: Shortcut

trans-unit.source: Result
trans-unit.target: Result

trans-unit.source: Menu Shortcut Key
trans-unit.target: Menu Shortcut Key

trans-unit.source: Result
trans-unit.target: Result

trans-unit.source: ALT+F
trans-unit.target: ALT+F

trans-unit.source: Opens the File menu.
trans-unit.target: Opens the File menu.

trans-unit.source: N
trans-unit.target: N

trans-unit.source: Opens a new console instance.
trans-unit.target: Opens a new console instance.

trans-unit.source: O
trans-unit.target: O

trans-unit.source: Opens the Administrative Tools page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Administrative Tools page.

trans-unit.source: S
trans-unit.target: S

trans-unit.source: Saves the StorSimple Snapshot Manager console.
trans-unit.target: Saves the StorSimple Snapshot Manager console.

trans-unit.source: A
trans-unit.target: A

trans-unit.source: Opens the Save As page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Save As page.

trans-unit.source: M
trans-unit.target: M

trans-unit.source: Opens the Add/Remove Snap-in page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Add/Remove Snap-in page.

trans-unit.source: P
trans-unit.target: P

trans-unit.source: Opens the Options page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Options page.

trans-unit.source: H
trans-unit.target: H

trans-unit.source: Opens online Help.
trans-unit.target: Opens online Help.

trans-unit.source: ALT+A
trans-unit.target: ALT+A

trans-unit.source: Opens the Action menu.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Action menu.

trans-unit.source: I
trans-unit.target: I

trans-unit.source: Turns the import display option on and off.
trans-unit.target: Turns the import display option on and off.

trans-unit.source: W
trans-unit.target: W

trans-unit.source: Opens a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager console.
trans-unit.target: Opens a new StorSimple Snapshot Manager console.

trans-unit.source: F
trans-unit.target: F

trans-unit.source: Updates the StorSimple Snapshot Manager console.
trans-unit.target: Updates the StorSimple Snapshot Manager console.

trans-unit.source: L
trans-unit.target: L

trans-unit.source: Opens the Export List page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Export List page.

trans-unit.source: H
trans-unit.target: H

trans-unit.source: Opens online Help.
trans-unit.target: Opens online Help.

trans-unit.source: ALT+V
trans-unit.target: ALT+V

trans-unit.source: Opens the View menu.
trans-unit.target: Opens the View menu.

trans-unit.source: A
trans-unit.target: A

trans-unit.source: Opens the Add/Remove Columns page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Add/Remove Columns page.

trans-unit.source: U
trans-unit.target: U

trans-unit.source: Opens the Customize View page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Customize View page.

trans-unit.source: ALT+O
trans-unit.target: ALT+O

trans-unit.source: Opens the Favorites menu.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Favorites menu.

trans-unit.source: A
trans-unit.target: A

trans-unit.source: Opens the Add to Favorites page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Add to Favorites page.

trans-unit.source: O
trans-unit.target: O

trans-unit.source: Opens the Organize Favorites page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Organize Favorites page.

trans-unit.source: ALT+W
trans-unit.target: ALT+W

trans-unit.source: Opens the Window menu.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Window menu.

trans-unit.source: N
trans-unit.target: N

trans-unit.source: Opens another StorSimple Snapshot Manager window.
trans-unit.target: Opens another StorSimple Snapshot Manager window.

trans-unit.source: C
trans-unit.target: C

trans-unit.source: Displays all open console windows in a cascading style.
trans-unit.target: Displays all open console windows in a cascading style.

trans-unit.source: T
trans-unit.target: T

trans-unit.source: Displays all open console windows in a grid pattern.
trans-unit.target: Displays all open console windows in a grid pattern.

trans-unit.source: I
trans-unit.target: I

trans-unit.source: Arranges icons in a horizontal row at the bottom of your screen.
trans-unit.target: Arranges icons in a horizontal row at the bottom of your screen.

trans-unit.source: ALT+H
trans-unit.target: ALT+H

trans-unit.source: Opens the Help menu.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Help menu.

trans-unit.source: H
trans-unit.target: H

trans-unit.source: Opens online Help.
trans-unit.target: Opens online Help.

trans-unit.source: T
trans-unit.target: T

trans-unit.source: Opens the Microsoft TechNet Tech Center web page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the Microsoft TechNet Tech Center web page.

trans-unit.source: A
trans-unit.target: A

trans-unit.source: Opens the About Microsoft Management Console page.
trans-unit.target: Opens the About Microsoft Management Console page.
